_header: That I ate that I had
Note: Cf. 5140, 5139; for a variant incorporated into an epitaph cf. 632.

CamPem32.Transcription:
Þat ich et þat ich habba haddeÞat ich gaf
                    þat ich habbeÞat ich ay held þat i nabbe

Wenzel,  Siegfried.
